summary: Remove DestructMemorizedInstanceException from the PHP SDK by improving cleanup of workflow context and promises during object destruction.
userImpact: Developers encounter unnecessary exceptions during workflow cleanup that complicate error handling and application stability.
rootCause: Current implementation throws DestructMemorizedInstanceException when cleaning up workflow context and promises during object destruction.
proposedFix: Refactor the workflow context and promises cleanup logic to gracefully handle resource deallocation without throwing exceptions.
keyQuote: We need to make the SDK stop throwing `DestructMemorizedInstanceException`. I think we can remove the Workflow context and promises without throwing this exception.
